collection_holder_name: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections
pageContext.collection_title: Steven Muller Interview by Astrid M. Eckert
pageContext.collection_description: A recording of an interview with Muller in which he discusses his career as a child actor in Hollywood and as a contestant in radio quiz shows, including The Hollywood Smarty Party and also his appearances on other radio shows such as I Was There and the Mercury Theater of the Air.
